td.p: It announces rain and strong wind with its song, which is rare because it is a bird that does not sing frequently.

tr.td: Announces the beginning of the rainy season, or enough rain during the season with its song during the early morning.
It indicates nearby rain when rising at high altitude during its flight in open places.
